Ingredients: 10 frozen strawberries, 1 cup yogurt, 1/2 cup orange juice, 1/2 teaspoon sugar
Preperation Steps: 1. In a food processor or blender, process all the ingredients until smooth.

Ingredients: 3/4 cup yogurt, 3/4 cup whole milk, 3/4 cup blueberries, 3/4 cup mangos, 1 tablespoon honey, 1 splash vanilla extract
Preperation Steps: 1. Add all ingredients to a blender. 2. Process until the mixture is completely smooth. 3. If the smoothie is too thick, add additional milk. 4. Pour and serve immediately.

Ingredients: 2 avocados, 3 cups coconut milk, 3 cups mangos
Preperation Steps: 1. In a food processor or blender, process all the ingredients until smooth.

Ingredients: 2 cups peaches, 2 cups spinach, 1 cup blueberries, 1 cup whole milk, 1 teaspoon honey
Preperation Steps: 1. In a food processor or blender, process all the ingredients until smooth, about 1 to 2 minutes, stopping to scrape down the mixture if necessary. 2. Pour into glasses.

Ingredients: 1 bananas, 1/2 cup whole milk, 1/4 cup yogurt, 1 1/2 tablespoons peanut butter
Preperation Steps: 1. Put all of the ingredients into a blender and blend until smooth.

Ingredients: 2 cups mixed berries, strawberries and raspberries, 1 beets, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, 2 teaspoons coconut oil
Preperation Steps: 1. Put the berries, 1/2 cup cold water, beet, lemon juice, honey and coconut oil into a blender. 2. Blend on high until smooth, turning off the blender and pushing down on the ingredients with a spatula or wooden spoon as needed to help the blending process. 3. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons more water if needed to adjust consistency.

Ingredients: 1/2 cup cucumbers, 3 tablespoons whole milk, 1 tablespoon honey, 1/2 lime juice, 2 cups watermelons
Preperation Steps: 1. Put the cucumber, buttermilk, honey if using and lime juice into a blender. 2. Blend on high until smooth. 3. Add half of the frozen watermelon and blend until almost completely smooth, turning off the blender and pushing down on the ingredients with a spatula or wooden spoon as needed to help the blending process. 4. Add the remaining frozen watermelon and continue to blend until smooth. 5. Add 1 to 2 tablespoons of water if needed to adjust consistency. 6. Pour into a glass and garnish with a cucumber slice.

Ingredients: 1/2 cup tomatoes, 3/4 cup watermelon, 1/2 strawberries, 2 basil leaves, 1 tablespoon honey
Preperation Steps: 1. Blend ingredients in a blender until smooth. 2. Pour into a glass and garnish with a watermelon wedge.

Ingredients: 2 teaspoons lime juice, 1 bananas, up coconut milk, 1 cup spinach, 1 tablespoon honey
Preperation Steps: 1. Blend ingredients in a blender until smooth. 2. Pour into a glass and garnish with an umbrella straw.

1. In a covered small saucepan, cook carrots in a small amount of boiling water about 15 minutes or until very tender. 2. Drain well. 3. Cool. 4. Place drained carrots in a blender. 5. Add orange juice. 6. Cover and blend until smooth. 7. Add ice cubes; cover and blend until smooth. 8. Pour into glasses.
